price: 56. « Votre Seigneur, répliqua-t-il, est le Seigneur des cieux et de la terre, Qui les a créés (de rien). Je suis de ceux qui peuvent en témoigner.
arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal rabbukum rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alladhī faṭarahunna wa-anā ʿalā dhālikum mina al-shāhidīna
